short_summary: Digital Transformation project for Departmental projects and initiatives for Global Affairs Canada
description: The Department of Foreign Affairs Trade and Development Canada (DFATD) has identified a requirement for multiple Project Executives and Business Analysts with a Secret clearance to provide a project support to Business Solutions team in ensuring the delivery of cloud-based technologies, low code platforms and client relationship and case management solutions. One of the core functions of this  Business solutions division in Department of Foreign Affairs Trade and Development Canada to empower Department of Foreign Affairs Trade and Development by de-centralizing the planning, discovery, conceptualization, development, deployment, and maintenance of business applications.

full_summary:
# Title 
**TBIPS – SIA Digital Transformation – Business Services -Resource Pool**

**Reference Number:** cb-5371-42914943, Amendment 1
**Solicitation Number:** 23-240340

## Notice Details

### Publication Date
2023-05-11
### Tender Closing Date
2023-05-25 14:00:00
### Amendment Date
2023-05-25

**Tender Status:** Expired

## Procurement Details

This is an Invitation to bid (RFP) against Supply Arrangement for the Department of Foreign Affairs Trade and Development Canada (DFATD). 

**Procurement Category:** SRV
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective tendering
**Trade Agreements:** Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

## Requirements

The Department is seeking multiple Project Executives and Business Analysts with a Secret security clearance to support the Business Solutions team in the delivery of Digital Transformation projects. The Business Solutions division aims to empower DFATD by de-centralizing the planning, delivery, operation, and measurement of technology enabled business solutions. The selected consultants will help clients with identifying opportunities to transform and improve their digital posture and legacy processes.

## Contact Information
**Contact Name:** Betty Woodman
**Contact Email:** [betty.woodman@international.gc.ca](mailto:betty.woodman@international.gc.ca)
**Contact Phone:** (343) 203-6922

## Documentations
Please find the documents attached. [English version](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5371/23-240340-npp-english.pdf) [French version,](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5371/23-240340-npp-french.pdf)

## Notice URL: None
